cards.special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 1. Then, you may sacrifice a permanent and draw a card.
[-2]: Choose up to two land cards in your graveyard. You may put up to one of them onto the battlefield. Return the rest to your hand. You gain 2 life.
[-8]: For each card in your graveyard, each opponent loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a permanent.

Okalae, Gloryseeker is a 5/5 Berserker creature with haste and indestructible as long as it is your turn. [i](They don't lose loyalty while they're not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[+1]: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[-2]: Okalae deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature or planeswalker died this turn, they deal 5 damage to that target instead.

cards.special_text:
Whenever you cast a spell for an alternative cost, put a loyalty counter on Kel.
[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card. You may play an additional land this turn.
[-3]: When you cast your next spell with mana value 3 or less this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](Copies of permanent spells resolve as tokens)[/i]
[-6]: Exile target card in your graveyard. You may play that card as long as it remains exiled and you may pay {G}{U} rather than pay its mana cost.

Once each turn, whenever you lose life or Aiko is dealt damage, you may have each opponent loses that much life. 
[+1]: Aiko deals 2 damage to up to one target permanent, and you gain 2 life.
[-3]: You draw 3 cards and you lose 3 life.
[-8]: Until end of turn, you may cast spells without paying their mana costs. Whenever you cast a spell this way, you lose life equal to its mana value.

[+1]: Create a white enchantment token with “At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.”
[-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent. Its controller gains 4 life.
[-4]: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

{1}{U}: You may activate one of Han Ahxing, Ascendant's loyalty abilities. Activate only during an opponent's turn and only once each turn.
[+1]: Return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
[-6]: Take an extra turn after this one.

[+1]: Each player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.
[-2]: Vikalden deals 3 damage to target player and up to one target permanent they control. You gain 3 life.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “Swamps you control have ‘{T}: Add {B}{B}.'” and “{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}: You draw five cards and lose 5 life.”

[+2]: Exile the top two cards of your library. An opponent may pay life equal to their total mana value. If they do, you may play those cards until end of turn. If they don't, you may play those cards without paying their mana costs.
[-X]: Xepa deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers, and X damage to each opponent.
[-6]: Destroy all artifacts and nonbasic lands.

[+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card unless you own a card in exile.
[-2]: Exile up to two other target permanents, then return them to the battlefield under their controller's control.
[-5]: Return target creature, artifact, or enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield phased out. [i](It doesn't trigger enter the battlefield abilities.)[/i]

[+1]: Create a Treasure token. Then if you control three or more artifacts, draw a card.
[-X]: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value plus X, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
[-7]: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws two cards.

[+1]: Up to one target creature gets -3/-1 until your next turn.
[-2]: Choose a card you own from outside the game. You may put it into your library third from the top.
[-7]: For each player, search that player's library for a planeswalker card and put it onto the battlefield under your control, then that player shuffles.

You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.
[+1]: Scry 2. Create a tapped Treasure token.
[-3]: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment that player controls.
[-7]: Draw seven cards, then untap all lands you control. They gain all basic types until end of turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, choose three cards at random, and conjure a copy of each of those cards into your hand.
[+2]: You may exile a card from your hand or graveyard. If you do, cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.
[-4]: Each opponent chooses a creature, an artifact, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among nonland permanents they control, and exiles the rest.
[-9]: You get an emblem with “If you would lose the game, instead you may exile a permanent you control. If you do, your life total becomes 1.”

Spend only mana of different types to cast Quxfin. [i]({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}{C} are the types of mana.)[/i]
[+1]: Create a 0/0 Army creature token, then put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creatures you control.
[-1]: Draw a card. You may cast a non-planeswalker spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
[-6]: All permanents and players lose hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. When they do, Quxfin deals 8 damage to any target.

Whenever you activate one of Sadie's loyalty abilities, you get an emblem with “Eureka!” [i](It has “At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.”)[/i]
[+1]: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
[-3]: Return two target cards that don't share a type from your graveyard to your hand.
[-5]: You may put any number of land cards from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with lesser power or lesser toughness than it.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 green Rat creature token.
[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value plus 1, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. You can't cast other types of spells.
[+1]: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
[0]: Up to one target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
[-3]: Archmage Jessica Turin deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

[+1]: Tap or untap up to one target permanent. You may put a stun counter on it.
[-2]: Tap up to two artifacts you control. Whenever you tap an artifact this way, Carmella deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, mill until you mill a noncreature, nonland card. Put that card into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.”

When Rozalia dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile her, then you may cast Sapphire, Aspiring Lich as long as she remains exiled.
[+1]: Until end of turn, Rozalia becomes a 4/4 Elf Warrior creature with indestructible and haste. [i](She doesn't lose loyalty while not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-2]: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or card in a graveyard.
When Sapphire dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile her, then you may cast Rozalia, Lichbane as long as she remains exiled.
[+1]: You may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, then each player discards a card.

[+1]: You may discard a card or sacrifice a permanent. If you do, draw a card.
[-2]: Search your library for a land card that doesn't share a name with a land you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[-3]: Put a paradise counter on target land. It gains indestructible and “{T}: Add two mana of any combination of colors.”

[+2]: You gain 4 life.
[0]: Caydin, Himbo Heroine fights another target creature or planeswalker [i](Planeswalkers fight using their loyalty)[/i].
[-4]: Distribute four +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. If you don't control a creature, instead create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.

[+2]: Untap another target nonland permanent. It gains indestructible until your next turn. You gain 2 life.
[-2]: Return target non-Maxomon permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana cost.
[-10]: You get an emblem with “Permanents you control can't leave the battlefield unless sacrificed to pay a cost.”

Lands you control have “{T}: Add two mana of any combination of colors. Spend this only to cast creature spells.”
[+2]: Create a 3/3 red Lizard creature token with haste. Mill three cards.
[-3]: Return any number of target creature cards with different names from your graveyard to your hand.

[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures that share creature types.
[0]: Until end of turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast permanent spells.”
[-6]: Choose a creature type. Search your library for any number of creature cards of that type, reveal them, then put them into your hand and shuffle.

[+1]: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Choose target nonland permanent or card in a graveyard. It's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
[-4]: Create a X/X Avatar creature token that is all colors, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

cards.special_text:

[-X]: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to twice X.
[-10]: Draw four cards. Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in your hand.

You may activate an additional loyalty ability of Bloodstained Armund during your turn if a creature died this turn.
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, each opponent discards a card and loses 1 life.
[0]: Bloodstained Armund deals 1 damage to any target.
[-7]: Target player mills half their library, then each opponent loses life equal to the number of creature cards in their graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of times you've gained life this turn.

cards.rules_text:
You may cast blue spells as though they had flash. They can't be countered.
Whenever you cast a spell, untap target permanent if its your turn. Otherwise, tap target permanent.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, Antipathy deals 1 damage to each opponent. It deals 2 damage instead if that spell was red.
As long as an opponent has 10 or less life, creatures you control gain +1/+0 and have haste.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a green spell, proliferate.
Whenever you activate an ability of a planeswalker or attack, put a +1/+1 counter or a loyalty counter on target permanent.
cards.flavor_text:

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a black spell you own, exile the top card of each opponent's library. You may play those cards as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any color to do so.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses life equal to the number of permanents you control that you don't own.

If you would draw a card, instead search your library for a card and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Your opponents can't cast more than one spell each turn.

Whenever you cast a spell, create a 0/0 colorless Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.
Once on each of your turn, you may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Quxfin built their empire on the corpses of gods.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast a black spell, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Demon creature token. If you have 13 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you have 6 or less life, it gains haste until end of turn.
